00016 
00017 template<class T = double>
00018 class VectorBase
00019 {
00020   public:
00021   
00022       
00023     VectorBase(){}
00027     virtual ~VectorBase(){}
00033     virtual T *getElementsPointer() const = 0;
00038     virtual T getElement(int position) const = 0;
00043     virtual void setElement(int position, T elementValue)= 0;
00049     virtual int getNumElements() const  = 0;
00055     virtual bool isRowVector() const = 0;
00061     bool isColumnVector() const {return !isRowVector(); }
00067     VectorBase<T> &operator=(const VectorBase<T> &vectorBase);
00073     virtual MatrixInitializer<T> operator=(const T &elementValue) = 0;
00081     void output(ostream &outputStream = cout);
